backend/main.mo: Main canister with authorization, client/workout data models, maps for storing users and workouts, and utility/query functions for trainer-client operations.
backend/migration.mo: Module defining old/new data types and migration logic to convert single-weight exercise fields into per-set weight arrays across stored entities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs for per-set weight UI updates and workout display changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing authentication, dashboards, trainer/client components, and workout-related UI features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global theme variables and styles defining light/dark color palettes and component defaults.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading the main client script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication, view switching between trainer/client flows, and global React Query and theme providers.
frontend/src/components/client/AssignedW: Fetches and displays assigned workouts for a client, showing loading, empty state, and a list of editable workout cards.
frontend/src/components/client/Compilabl: Renders a form for completing a workout, validating exercise inputs, building a WorkoutLog, and submitting it.
frontend/src/components/client/WorkoutLo: Displays a client's workout history with loading and empty states, sorting logs by date and showing completion status.
frontend/src/components/trainer/Bodyweig: Shows bodyweight progression with summary stats and a simple bar-style visual chart based on sorted weight entries.
frontend/src/components/trainer/ClientWo: Lists trainer-created workouts with exercise details, handling an empty state and showing per-set or single-set weights.
frontend/src/components/trainer/Exercise: Groups exercise performance records by exercise name, supports search filtering, and displays first vs latest performance metrics.
frontend/src/components/trainer/TrainerC: UI for trainers to view and edit client info, track bodyweight and exercise progress, and manage workouts via tabs.
frontend/src/components/trainer/WorkoutB: Form component that builds and validates workouts with exercises, sets, reps, and per‑set weights, then submits them to the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity loading, status tracking, and context access.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating client data, workouts, bodyweight, height, and trainer-related info via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, wraps it with query and identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboardPage.t: Client dashboard that displays assigned workouts, progress logs, and a form to add workout progress with validation and backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/ClientLoginPage.tsx: Client login page handling username and PT code authentication with error mapping and navigation to registration or trainer login.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Trainer dashboard showing PT code, client list, client details, and email editing with related backend queries and mutations.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Trainer login page validating an access code via backend authentication with detailed error parsing and messaging.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: Client registration page handling username, PT code, and optional email, performing backend registration and auto-login on success.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL or hash params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the hash.
frontend/src/utils/workoutSetWeights.ts: Utilities to normalize, validate, format, detect, and convert per‑set workout weights.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app features, versions, and current functional capabilities.
